roleset.name: forbid, prohibit

example.name: the one example
example.text: Yesterday's election was a sequel to Enfield's annual meeting in June when Mr. Blair disallowed proxies in favor of two Hees nominees *trace*.
example.arg: in favor of two Hees nominees

roleset.note: DISALLOW-V NOTES: The 'in favor of...' clause is problematic. It's marked as -CLR intreebank, but I think that misses the generalization that 'in favorof' can be attached to any verb of dispreferring. I feel 'in favorof' to be a predicate in its own right, similar to comparatives, andtherefore safely postponed until we deal with that question. (from disallow.01-v)
